1311240.name: Heretic's Lot
1311240.description:
Heretic's Lot is an unusual combination of several game genres. It is a puzzle game mixed with roguelike elements.



Once upon a time you were the most famous knight in the kingdom. But then you accomplished what the Order forbade to speak about in fear of the death penalty. Now your destiny is to atone for your sins in the service of the Order or perish at the hands of the executioner. Go to the Hillford and find out what infects the local lands.



Unconventional gameplay combined with original art style. Each playthrough is a bit different with randomly generated elements. Fight champions and adapting enemies each level. Make your way through cursed lands to repent your sins. Seek out and destroy the source of horrid blight plaguing locals.
Learn perks, collect battle spells, solve puzzles, discover magic auras, fight bosses, find what cursed lands are hiding.

  • UNCONVENTIONAL GAMEPLAY
  • VARIED LOCATIONS
  • BOSS FIGHTS
  • SPECIAL PUZZLE LEVELS
  • UNIQUE ART STYLE
  • TONS OF PERKS AND BATTLE SPELLS
